translatedContent: You can find a sample story submitted to a writing comp [here](https://blog.reedsy.com/short-story/wo9iuy/#comments)

originContent: A modern, evolutionary writing system that uses AI models to generate, evaluate, and evolve creative stories or general writing pieces through iterative competitions. Built with clean, modular Python architecture following modern design principles.
translatedContent: A modern, evolutionary writing system that uses AI models to generate, evaluate, and evolve creative stories or general writing pieces through iterative competitions. Built with clean, modular Python architecture following modern design principles.

originContent: - üß¨ **Evolutionary Algorithm**: Stories evolve through AI-powered tournaments
translatedContent: - üß¨ **Evolutionary Algorithm**: Stories evolve through AI-powered tournaments

originContent: - üéØ **Dual Writing Modes**: Creative storytelling and general writing optimization
translatedContent: - üéØ **Dual Writing Modes**: Creative storytelling and general writing optimization

originContent: - üèÜ **ELO Tournament System**: Sophisticated ranking through pairwise comparisons
translatedContent: - üèÜ **ELO Tournament System**: Sophisticated ranking through pairwise comparisons

originContent: - üåê **Web Interface**: Human validation and story comparison tools
translatedContent: - üåê **Web Interface**: Human validation and story comparison tools

originContent: # Configure your API keys (see Configuration section below)
translatedContent: # Configure your API keys (see Configuration section below)
The system follows modern Python design principles with clean separation of concerns:

originContent: The system follows modern Python design principles with clean separation of concerns:

translatedContent: - **`EvolutionPipeline`**: Main orchestrator that manages the complete evolution cycle

originContent: - **`EvolutionPipeline`**: Main orchestrator that manages the complete evolution cycle
translatedContent: - **`InitialStoryGenerator`**: Creates the first generation of stories from prompts

originContent: - **`InitialStoryGenerator`**: Creates the first generation of stories from prompts
translatedContent: - **`NextBatchGenerator`**: Evolves top performers into improved variants

originContent: - **`NextBatchGenerator`**: Evolves top performers into improved variants
translatedContent: - **`TournamentRunner`**: Manages ELO tournaments for story ranking

originContent: - **`TournamentRunner`**: Manages ELO tournaments for story ranking

translatedContent: The system follows a three-stage evolution cycle:

originContent: The system follows a three-stage evolution cycle:

translatedContent: - Creates multiple stories from your prompt

originContent: - Creates multiple stories from your prompt
translatedContent: - Uses configurable AI models (GPT, Claude, Llama, etc.)

originContent: - Uses configurable AI models (GPT, Claude, Llama, etc.)

translatedContent: - AI judges evaluate based on your rubric

originContent: - AI judges evaluate based on your rubric
translatedContent: - ELO ratings updated based on wins/losses

originContent: - ELO ratings updated based on wins/losses

translatedContent: This iterative process evolves increasingly better writing over time.

originContent: This iterative process evolves increasingly better writing over time.

translatedContent: The system supports multiple AI providers configured through `config.json`. The configuration maps models to providers and specifies which environment variables contain the API keys:

originContent: The system supports multiple AI providers configured through `config.json`. The configuration maps models to providers and specifies which environment variables contain the API keys:

translatedContent: Then set your API keys as environment variables:

originContent: Then set your API keys as environment variables:

translatedContent: You only need to set keys for the providers you plan to use. The system automatically routes model requests to the correct provider based on the configuration.

originContent: You only need to set keys for the providers you plan to use. The system automatically routes model requests to the correct provider based on the configuration.

translatedContent: The `config.json` file controls all system behavior:

originContent: The `config.json` file controls all system behavior:

translatedContent: - Focuses on storytelling, character development, and narrative techniques

originContent: - Focuses on storytelling, character development, and narrative techniques

translatedContent: - Focuses on academic papers, essays, reports, and professional writing

originContent: - Focuses on academic papers, essays, reports, and professional writing

translatedContent: For advanced users, you can customize the generation prompts, author styles, and mission sets by editing the files in the `src/generators/` directory:

originContent: For advanced users, you can customize the generation prompts, author styles, and mission sets by editing the files in the `src/generators/` directory:

translatedContent: **Mission Sets** - Define creative approaches and goals:

originContent: **Mission Sets** - Define creative approaches and goals:
"Focus on the psychological depth of characters",
translatedContent: "Focus on the psychological depth of characters",

translatedContent: "Write with the psychological insight of Virginia Woolf",

translatedContent: You can modify the judging criteria and evaluation prompts to focus on specific aspects of writing quality:

originContent: You can modify the judging criteria and evaluation prompts to focus on specific aspects of writing quality:
# Edit the judge_responses function to customize evaluation criteria
translatedContent: # Edit the judge_responses function to customize evaluation criteria
1. **Backup Original Files**: Always keep copies of the original generator files before making changes

originContent: 1. **Backup Original Files**: Always keep copies of the original generator files before making changes
translatedContent: 2. **Test Incrementally**: Make small changes and test with a few iterations before running full evolution cycles

originContent: 2. **Test Incrementally**: Make small changes and test with a few iterations before running full evolution cycles
translatedContent: 3. **Monitor Results**: Use the web interface to validate that your customizations improve story quality

originContent: 3. **Monitor Results**: Use the web interface to validate that your customizations improve story quality
translatedContent: 4. **Mix and Match**: Combine different mission sets and author styles for unique generation strategies

originContent: 4. **Mix and Match**: Combine different mission sets and author styles for unique generation strategies
translatedContent: 5. **Version Control**: Track your customizations with git to revert if needed

originContent: 5. **Version Control**: Track your customizations with git to revert if needed

translatedContent: This modular approach allows you to fine-tune the evolution process for your specific writing goals and domains.

originContent: This modular approach allows you to fine-tune the evolution process for your specific writing goals and domains.

translatedContent: Validate your evolution results with the built-in web interface:

originContent: Validate your evolution results with the built-in web interface:

originContent: - **Story Comparison**: Side-by-side reading and preference selection
translatedContent: - **ELO Rankings**: View current standings and statistics

originContent: - **ELO Rankings**: View current standings and statistics
